title: Smashed Berry, Lime, and Coconut Yogurt Ice Pops
directions: Mix together the berries, lime juice, and 1 Tbspn of sugar. Let sit for 10 to 15 minutes, then mash roughly with a fork. Set aside.
In a separate bowl, mix together the Greek yogurt, coconut milk (with cream), 2 1/2 Tbspn of sugar, and salt. Fold in the berries — juice and all — but make sure to leave streaks.
Fill ice pop molds and freeze for about 30 minutes to an hour, then insert ice pop sticks halfway. Freeze until solid — about 4 hours or overnight.
To unmold, dip the popsicle molds in running water or leave out for a few minutes.
Note on coconut milk: make sure to stir together the cream and milk in the coconut milk before using.
ingredients: 8 oz mixed berries (raspberries, blackberries, olallieberries, etc.)
